long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: (Unofficial) A simple extension that adds functionality to Igloo Software's site manager page for admins. This extension provides a bird's eye view, easy searching and a detailed table for all your channels on the site manager screen. You must be a system admin for this extension to work.
